data.name: Realpolitiks II Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Plan your world domination and conquer your opponents while listening to the Realpolitiks II Soundtrack created by the award-winning composer Adam Skorupa. The soundtrack features nearly 30 minutes of mesmerizing music composed exclusively for the game.
data.about_the_game: Plan your world domination and conquer your opponents while listening to the Realpolitiks II Soundtrack created by the award-winning composer Adam Skorupa. The soundtrack features nearly 30 minutes of mesmerizing music composed exclusively for the game.
data.short_description: Conquer the world with this mesmerizing Realpolitiks II Soundtrack composed by the award-winning composer Adam Skorupa! Enjoy world domination while listening to one of the best Polish video game composers out there!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 986 MB available space
